text:
The input data is in CSV format where columns are separated via whitespace. Each of these
ﬁles can be loaded as a NumPy array. The load file() function below loads a dataset given
the ﬁle path to the ﬁle and returns the loaded data as a NumPy array.
1https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jbrownlee/Datasets/master/HAR_Smartphones.zip
